data.text:
Helen James, President

After 30 years of career service with the Sarasota County Clerk of the Circuit Court, Helen James formed Suncoast Women of Action to help prepare the next generation of engaged citizens.

Spouse: Dr Edward James, II (deceased)

Child: Edward James, III

Affiliation: New Bethel MB Church

​NAACP: Lifetime Member

NAACP, Sarasota Branch

Executive Board Member

Lifetime Achievement Award 2022 Recipient

Woman of the Year 2013 Recipient

Healthy Start of Sarasota County: Board Member

Newtown Business Council Member

Second Chance Last Opportunity

Former Advisory Board Member

Business and Professional Women of North Sarasota

Woman of the Year Award 2013 Recipient

Sharon Preston-Folta, ​Vice President

Sharon Preston-Folta recently retired from a forty-plus-year career in advertising sales and marketing, predominantly as an account executive in radio. Sharon became a published author with her memoir "Living in The Shadow of my Father, Louis Daniel Armstrong '' in 2012, which made public the private family life of Louis Armstrong, Lucille 'Sweets' Preston and their child, Sharon. She's also the Executive Producer of the documentary 'Little Satchmo' based on her memoir.

She's currently a Volunteer Programmer at WSLR 96.5 LP FM in Sarasota, Florida where she resides with her husband, Howard, a musician.

​Velinda Bowens-Coats, Chaplin​

Spouse: Don Coats

Children: One daughter; four grandchildren;

two great grandchildren

Affiliation: Trinity Christian Fellowship Center

Volunteer - Work & Civic Education Mentor

Employer: Sarasota County School Board

Comcast Cable -- Retiree

Children: One son & four grandchildren
